entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API proposal]: System.CommandLine APIs #68578
  • Frequently hitting marshaling asserts while working on Corelib in VS #68572
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debugger tests run correctly but something is stuck and the tests never exit #68570
  • Dead code after switch over int64 influences result #68568
  • FileSystemEventArgs constructor throws with empty directory value #68566
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add back `ObsoletedInOSPlatformAttribute` for .NET 7 #68557
  • Consider moving UnspportOSPlatform on MD5 from the class to methods #68556
  • EnvelopedCms Decryption of binary data corrupts response on Linux if unencrypted data starts with byte value 0x04 #68554
  • OOME in RegexIgnoreCaseTests.Unicode_IgnoreCase_Tests on osx-arm64 #68545
  • What is the correct GC generation for static reference field in Net6? #68544
  • [wasm][debugger] Display parent's members on getProperties #68542
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix member type in static structures #68539
  • NativeAOT: Web App that uses "app.MapGet()" causes NullReferenceException during build #68538
  • Assertion failed '!"Instruction cannot be encoded: IF_LS_2B"' during 'Generate code' #68536
  • [API Proposal]: CollectionMarshal.AsSpan for a ReadOnlyCollection #68534
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.InternalBufferSizeTests.FileSystemWatcher_InternalBufferSize_SynchronizingObject #68532
  • ProxyTunnelRequest_OriginServerSendsProxyAuthChallenge_NoProxyAuthPerformed hung/slow #68531
  • Test failure JIT/Directed/VectorABI/VectorMgdMgdStatic_r/VectorMgdMgdStatic_r.sh #68530
  • gcstress=3 timeout failures #68529

Closed

  • Threadpool test CooperativeBlockingCanCreateThreadsFaster failing on Mac #66852
  • Determine from Host when HostedServices have completed / stopped working #58675
    Future
  • Test failure: Read_DataStoredAtDesiredOffset - CONNECTION_REFUSED #56613
    7.0.0
  • RegexSourceGenerator informational diagnostics are not being displayed on VS text editor nor on the console #68182
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Apply OpenTelemetry attribute limits to Activity #68528
    Future
  • Test failure System.PrivateUri.Tests.UriCreationOptionsTest.DisableCanonicalization_WorksWithDifferentSchemes #64889
    7.0.0
  • Why does Reflection lie? #68026
  • [iOS] Setting UmAlQura as a calendar culture results in a crash #68555
    6.0.x
  • Pkcs12Kdf can stack overflow with an exceptionally large password #68419
  • File.CreateAsSymbolicLink should throw if not able to create the symlink due to do not having permission #68525
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\CLR-x86-JIT\\V1-M09.5-PDC\\b27657\\b27657\\b27657.cmd #64246
    7.0.0
  • Add LoongArch64 architecture port #59561
    Future
  • Test failure GC\\API\\Frozen\\Frozen\\Frozen.cmd #66569
    7.0.0
  • Backport Move to Windows.10.Amd64.Server2022.ES.Open to 6.0 #67048
  • JIT: checked/release asm diff in windows and linux x64 #66155
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove an unnecessary assertion in tiering #68577
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Use `TempFile` in a test instead of `Path.GetTempFileName()` #68576
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1739550 #68575
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: add standard range enable for register stress #68574
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix process not being killed #68573
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][eventpipe] Implementing MethodDetails and BulkType events #68571
    area-Tracing-mono, needs-author-action
  • Add a few more Regex timeout tests #68567
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm-mt] fix build config logic error, and pthread_getschedparam initialization #68563
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • Remove unwrapping of OCTET STRING wrapping in EnvelopedCms. #68562
    area-System.Security
  • Update arm/arm64 Linux cross build images #68561
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Adding the 2-parameter xplat shuffle helpers and accelerating them #68559
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Build latest msquic locally in docker image #68558
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [eventpipe] Fix environment variable parser for multiple configurations #68552
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Rework unloadability fix #68550
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix VS complaining about missing projects in slns (continued) #68543
    area-Infrastructure
  • Reduce max shared memory object name length #68541
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • JIT ARM32: Fix wrong emitAttr passed for loads/stores in PUTARG_STK #68540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix nullability for IEnumFORMATETC #68537
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution

Merged

  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add a test for ECDSA signatures at zero #68271
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Fix createdump on Unix platforms that do not implement process_vm_readv #67544
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix a thread pool test #67399
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Update RegexGenerator message for LimitedSourceGenerationMessage #68569
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono] merge wasm-threading-eventpipe into main #68232
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove hash work in RsaPaddingProcessor.OpenProcessor. #68553
    area-System.Security
  • Tweak RegexGenerator scan loop #68560
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Allow custom IExternalScopeProvider in LoggerFactory via DI #67520
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Extend stress timeouts for merged tests #68523
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Allow port 65535 in UriParser.Register #68546
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary/erroneous initialization to base.Crawlpos() #68549
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Update diagnostic titles to use localized strings #68533
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Use checked arithmetic to prevent stack overflow in Pkcs12Kdf #68422
    area-System.Security
  • Decouple call store operands from local ret buf optimization #68469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle more scenarios for loop cloning #67930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Get rid of last mentions of DllImportGenerator #68535
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Fix leaks after unsuccessful assembly load (another try) #68502
    NO-MERGE, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Add vectorized paths for Span<T>.Reverse #64412
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Run illink before ApiCompat #66706
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework

Updated

  • Add initial impl of PartitionedRateLimiter.Create #67677
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Annotating System.Text.Json library for aot form factor #68464
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Add ValueTask pooling in more places #68457
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • [wasm][debugger] Rebind invalid breakpoints after receiving an update in that source file #64462
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add RL non-generic fixed window, sliding window implementations #68087
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] add support for parsing Unified TLS hello #68425
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [QUIC] Adopted msquic generated interop #68288
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add DI spec tests for scope factory singleton, hierarchical scopes #68517
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Stop IHostedService instances asynchronously by default #68216
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Remove stores as operands of calls in LIR #68460
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Release/6.0] Backport test fixes #68332
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() #67917
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Handle concurrent reads and concurrent writes on MsQuicStream #67329
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Reduce leaked test files #68522
    area-System.IO
  • Start morphing `TYP_STRUCT` local indirections in `LocalAddressVisitor` #68515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Asynchronous opening of QuicStreams #67859
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove usage of *wprintf* family of functions #68237
    area-VM-coreclr
  • avoid Reflection in Quic #68189
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add current-outgoing-connect-attempts counter to Sockets #66651
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • Optimize Matrix4x4 Decompose with fewer stores #66351
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize bswap+mov to movbe on xarch #66965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fixing API compat issues between ref/src for attributes on properties #68432
    breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [release/6.0] Fix JIT using too wide indirections when returning small structs #68379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move reflection based converter and contract resolution logic to DefaultJsonTypeInfoResolver #68496
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Delete `CLS_VAR` #68524
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Assign PropertyCache after it's configured for source gen in attempt to fix JSON LookupProperty assert failing #68480
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Add more array.sort test combination #68489
    community-contribution
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • issue-2214 Create File.ReadLinesAsync() #66492
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Refactor of getProperties mechanism #68486
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Always set `IND_NONFAULTING` for not-null addresses #68518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixes #41234 (#41376) #68500
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • skip the test when dotnet.exe is locked #66196
    area-System.IO, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Do not reset assigned interval twice #68327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
